thread.title: Eileen M.
thread.title_full: American Advisors Group reviewed by Eileen M.

author: Eileen M.
title: Eileen M.
text: THE ENTIRE PROCESS WAS SMOOTH FROM START TO FINISH THANKS TO AN EXCELLENT REPRSENTATIVE SERVICING MY LOAN. I AM VERY PLEASED AND I'M SURE SUCH SATISFACTION WILL CONTINUE IN THE ENSUING MONTHS AND YEARS. MY THANKS TO AAG AND TO JENNIFER F. WHO SERVICED MY LOAN.
